ygData.subject: Re: Poisen
ygData.msgSnippet: There are a couple items I can think of off the top of my head.....Earring of Poison Reflection, Collar of Undead Protection....I m sure there are others, but
ygData.messageBody:
There are a couple items I can think of off the top of my head.....Earring of Poison Reflection, Collar of Undead Protection....I'm sure there are others, but none I know of that you can get at your level :(

>>> Kyle Mobley <kyle@...> 5.18.99 5:52:49 AM >>>
From: Kyle Mobley <kyle@...>

Does anyone know if there is an item out there that will raise your
ability to resist poisen... I am a loley lvl 11 Warrior and it seems
that I take the worst damage from creatures that can poisen like
Rattlesnakes and Asps... any advice would be great...


Nelix
